verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 2:8
verses.text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed, whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth, and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming:

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 2:9
verses.text: Even him, whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders,

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 2:10
verses.text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish; because they received not the love of the truth, that they might be saved.

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 2:11
verses.text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion, that they should believe a lie:
